exceptions.exn: [Focus] Wrong bullet -: Current bullet - is not finished.

original: intros X times sum one zero M_sum sum_comm sum_cancel M_times distr_l distr_r b n f. induction n. - simpl. apply monoid_unit_l with (m:=sum) (u:=zero) in M_sum. rewrite M_sum. reflexivity. - simpl. rewrite distr_l. rewrite IHn. reflexivity.
